General.Name: PSK Inc
General.Description: PSK Inc. develops, manufactures, and sells semiconductor processing equipment in worldwide. The company offers dry strip, dry cleaning, new hard mask strip, and edge clean products. It also provides 3D IC packing equipment, such as plasma source, reflow, hot DI, and plasma surface treatment systems. The company was founded in 1990 and is based in Hwaseong-si, South Korea.
